entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
